title: Our Journey to Detect Log4j-Vulnerable Machines
description: Log4Shell (CVE-2021-44228) is a remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in the Apache-foundation open-source logging library Log4j. It was published on December 9, 2021, and then all hell broke loose. As Log4j is a common logging library for Java applications, it is highly widespread.
author: Stiv Kupchik
